channel.title: Can someone help me setup my VPS to host my 317 server! [Small Pay!]
channel.description:
Hey,
I have a VPS running Linux CENTOS. I want to start my 317 Server BlazeScape again, but i need someone to help me set my VPS up, as i used to host it on my computer. I just ordered the VPS and it has Cpanel installed too.
Please either PM me your MSN or reply bellow.
Thanks
Will pay small donation to anyone who helps!

item.title: Can someone help me setup my VPS to host my 317 server! [Small Pay!]
item.dc:creator: @Munches Munches
item.description:
@Munches wrote:

This is no help what so ever just thought I would point out the obvious of why get a Linux OS if you cannot operate it? I know some cheap windows hosting for the same prices as Linux. Sorry didnt help at all but hey Mine is hosted on Windows

Read full topic
